sentences.en: An unsought pathos came hand in hand with awe.
sentences.cn: 与恐惧相随而来的是一种意想不到的悲怆.

sentences.en: And so that interview Between Lucie and Sydney Carton has a pathos that wrings our hearts.
sentences.cn: 因此,露西和西德尼·卡登之间的会晤带有一种使我们感到揪心的凄楚的气氛.

sentences.en: As she sat in church her face had a pathos and poignancy.
sentences.cn: 当她坐在教堂里时,脸上带着一种哀婉和辛辣的表情.

sentences.en: He had hearty distaste for songs of pathos.
He speaks of nature with a certain unconscious pathos.
sentences.cn: 他提到自然,不知不觉有点伤感.

sentences.en: Its tone is rather of an obvious pathos.
sentences.cn: 它的基调流露出十分明显的凄怆.

sentences.en: Pathos has this quality , that It'seems ever addressed to one alone.
sentences.cn: 悲伤的感情似乎总是对个人而发,具有令人凄恻的力量.

sentences.en: Pathos, humour and terror, in this film, prove rather incompatible bedfellows.
sentences.cn: 在这部影片中, 哀婉 、 幽默、恐惧显得是一些互不相容的拼凑.

sentences.en: The pathos of the situation brought tears to our eyes.
sentences.cn: 情况令人怜悯,看得我们不禁流淚.

sentences.en: the pathos of the woman trying to keep her lover
sentences.cn: 那个女人试图留住爱侣的哀婉之情

sentences.en: The play is notable for the pathos of its final scene.
sentences.cn: 该剧以最后一场的哀婉动人而著称.

sentences.en: The quite magnificence of his political pathos lay in this.
sentences.cn: 他的深沉博大的政治感召力就在这里.

sentences.en: There is abundant pathos in her words.
sentences.cn: 她的话里富有动人哀怜的力量.

sentences.en: What unutterable pathos was in his voice!
sentences.cn: 他的声音里有着多么难以形容的哀愁!

sentences.en: With touching pathos he described the pangs of hunger.
sentences.cn: 他以极具感伤力的笔触描述了饥饿的痛苦。

words.tran_cn: 悲怅；痛苦；同情；哀婉动人的词句

trans.tran_cn: 悲怆，哀婉，凄楚，伤感，痛苦，同情
trans.tran_en: the quality that a person, situation, film, or play has that makes you feel pity and sadness
